# lumos_access_policy (Data Source)

AccessPolicy DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "lumos_access_policy" "my_accesspolicy" {
  id = "...my_id..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique ID of the access policy.

### Read-Only

- `access_condition` (String) The condition determining which identities qualify for this policy. Parsed as JSON.
- `apps` (Attributes List) The list of apps and permissions granted by this access policy. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--apps))
- `business_justification` (String) Explanation for why this policy exists.
- `is_everyone_condition` (Boolean)
- `name` (String) The name of the access policy.

<a id="nestedatt--apps"></a>
### Nested Schema for `apps`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The ID of this app.
- `is_preapproved` (Boolean) Whether requests created via this access policy are pre-approved.
- `permissions` (Attributes List) List of permissions granted for this app. Empty list means app-level grant. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--apps--permissions))

<a id="nestedatt--apps--permissions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `apps.permissions`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The ID of this requestable permission.
